comments:

Win XP Pro SP2, j2sdk 1.5.0_06, Eclipse 3.2M6, GEF 3.2M6,  EMF 2.2.0M6, dtp-sdk_0.9M6_N040706.zip with patch mentioned in Comment #7 for Bug #136482.

Hi Vladyslav, are you still able to reproduce this bug using the DTP 0.9RC3? If so, please try the latest source code. Though I couldn't reproduce it any more, I made some changes to the SQLEditor to make it safer.
